General.Name: CIMG Inc.
General.Description: CIMG Inc., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, packs, and sells single-serve pour-over coffee and tea bag-style coffee for coffee roasters and food service companies in North America, South Korea, Singapore, Hong Kong, Mainland China, and internationally. The company sells its products under Coffee Blenders, Twin Peaks, DRIPKIT, and Stone Brewing brand names. The company was formerly known as NuZee, Inc. and changed its name to CIMG Inc. in October 2024. CIMG Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Vista, California.
General.Address: 2865 Scott Street, Vista, CA, United States, 92081
